ygData.subject: RE: Char Catillion
ygData.msgSnippet: (Sorry I think I got my enchanter and my bard mixed up. They are about the same level and I was doing jewelry with my enchanter lately) Sarah Heacock
ygData.messageBody:
(Sorry I think I got my enchanter and my bard mixed up. They are about the
same level and I was doing jewelry with my enchanter lately)

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 15 Songweaver of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance,Test
Feyre, level 8 Dark Elf Wizard of Solusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, Test

>-----Original Message-----
>From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, January 11, 2000 2:00 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Char Catillion
>
>
>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Fri, 7 Jan 2000, Joshua R. Moore wrote:
>>
>> I never got "Name looks friendly"
>
>That is the message enchanters get when they use their
>faction-raising spells.
>
>> I get "You feel an aura of enchantment wash over you" and the NPC glows.
>
>That is the message bards get.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
